attributes.action: Instruct HMRC to send Thank-You cards to 40%+ Taxpayers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Having just been mugged by HMRC with the amount of tax I will have to pay this January, I think it would be rather nice if HMRC were to send out Thank-You cards to everyone who has to pay 40%+ tax.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
